title: "Israel-Hamas war stirs free speech battles at college campuses across US"
excerpt: "A history professor at Cornell University in Ithaca, New York, who initially referred to Hamas’ first attack on Israel as “energizing” and “exhilarating” at an off-campus rally defended his remarks. A few days later he apologized, the campus newspaper reported. He is now on leave, according to the Cornell Review."
